mapper.select: SELECT t3.*, t1.name, t2.task_name FROM pms_member t1, project_task t2, project_log t3 WHERE t1.pno = t2.pno AND t1.pno = t3.pno AND t2.project_no = #{no} ORDER BY regdte

SELECT t1.task_no, t1.task_name, t2.name, t1.enddte, t1.task_priority, t3.PROJECT_NAME FROM pms_member t2, project_task t1, PMS_PROJECT t3 WHERE t1.pno = t2.pno and t1.task_parent_no = 0 AND t1.PROJECT_NO = t3.PROJECT_NO AND t1.project_no = #{no}
SELECT t1.task_no, t1.task_name, t2.name, t1.enddte, t1.task_priority FROM pms_member t2, project_task t1 WHERE t1.pno = t2.pno and t1.task_parent_no = 0 AND t1.project_no = #{no} order by t1.enddte

SELECT DISTINCT t1.pno, t1.NAME, t3.project_name, (SELECT count(*) FROM PROJECT_TASK WHERE t1.pno = pno) AS task_tot, (SELECT count(*) FROM PROJECT_TASK where TASK_STATUS = '완료' and t1.pno = pno) AS task_done FROM pms_member t1, PROJECT_TASK t2, pms_project t3 WHERE t2.PROJECT_NO = #{no} AND t2.PROJECT_NO = t3.PROJECT_NO ORDER BY pno
